snippet: Golden State and San Antonio have the NBA's two best records since the All-Star break, which certainly is no surprise since the Warriors and Spurs have been well atop the league all season....
lead_paragraph: Golden State and San Antonio have the NBA's two best records since the All-Star break, which certainly is no surprise since the Warriors and Spurs have been well atop the league all season.

headline.main: Hornets Top Heat 109-106, Rallying From 15-Point Deficit
headline.print_headline: Hornets Top Heat 109-106, Rallying From 15-Point Deficit
